detaileddescription.para:
Callback function called when the PDU is received. Timeout counter of the associated network is reset. Timeout counters associated to the PDU are reset. StartOnReceive events associated to the PDU are set. EnableUpdate counters associated to the PDU are incremented. All signals belonging to the PDU having queued handling are pushed in the queues. All multiple received signals belonging to the PDU are updated.
reentrant No context task thread safe No synchronous Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.
void
void Globals
Affected variables: SAMPLE_enCurrentState. SAMPLE_enRequestedState. SAMPLE_u8Intensity.
Error Handling
No error handling is performed by RteLight. This has to be done by the application software
Call Sequence
Verification criteria
Testcase shall test the counter variables of network and PDU..
Test Method
The testing method is described in TEST_Rte_RxInd_PDUNAME
Traceability
This covers the generic function Rte_RxInd_<PDUNAME> from architecture. Satisfies following DOORS Requirements:
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_RteLight_313,SWR_ICAS1_RteLight_287,SWR_ICAS1_RteLight_307.

briefdescription.para: Contains the RteLight's related Rx Indication and Tx Confirmation functions.
